Method.Doc: Give the response to an agreement, with statement names and type

XSelect.XField: agr.id as id_agreement_response, agstl.name, agsl.statement as statement, ags.code, ags.expire_date_expression, agr.agreement_statement_response, agr.expire_date, agr.agreement_statement_context

XFrom.XTable: fw_agreement ag INNER JOIN fw_agreement_response agr ON (agr.id_agreement = ag.id) INNER JOIN fw_agreement_statement ags ON (ags.id = agr.id_agreement_statement) INNER JOIN fw_agreement_statement_lang agsl ON (agsl.id = ags.id AND agsl.lang='{param->_lang}') INNER JOIN fw_agreement_statement_type agst ON (agst.id = ags.id_agreement_statement_type) INNER JOIN fw_agreement_statement_type_lang agstl ON (agstl.id = agst.id AND agstl.lang='{param->_lang}')
